description: brown hard bound book with cream- colored band across cover with 'SOLDAT!' printed in middle; brown tulle tap binds outer cover, with two ties on PL side; inner cover is a corroded metal with red and gold label attached along PR side, extending to spine of the book; interior of book holds a series of black and white printed images of female faces appearing to be in anguish; lender's archive #189
provenance: William P. Kosmas, London, England (d. 2017); Estate of William P. Kosmas, Minneapolis
title: Soldat!
